name.description: Name of the project, usually a identifier key from an issue tracker.

quality_display_name.description: Human-readable name of the project from the quality control dashboard.

recent.description: Whether the project has recent sprints.

core.description: Whether the project is considered to be an actual software development project. When `false`, the project is developed by a support team.

main.description: Whether the project is a main project with no parent. When `false`, the project is a child of another.
